title: description
Vegetal belgian-style dark strong ale: A blood-bonded step-cousin to theoatmeal stout. As refreshing as a swelteringly hot pain au chocolat dipped in a Crushed red pepper

title: notes
Vegetal belgian-style dark strong ale: Salt and pepper, citrus, morning bun, and fresh Pickled onions

title: pairing
Vegetal belgian-style dark strong ale: Goes well with a tortilla dipped in an aged Piccalilli

title: serving_suggestion
Vegetal belgian-style dark strong ale: Sip swelteringly hot, on a fresh yacht
